title: Receive error transferring player level "1A" and has 6 or more years of MN service
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in 
AND has selected a Minor League player that has 6 or more years of Service
custom_steps:
WHEN user creates a new Transfer tx for player
AND transfers him to a level 1A club
AND clicks Submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user receives error "Player may exceed service restrictions in MLR 51"
AND can Ignore & Override the message
OR click Back

title: Player that is DFA from 40-man Roster cannot be on Option
custom_preconds:
GIVEN player's roster status is DFA 
AND was marked on the 40-man roster
custom_steps:
WHEN an optional assignment is being created for player
AND required fields are filled in
AND user clicks submit or Approve
custom_expected:
THEN user will receive error "A player that has been designated for assignment or release from the 40-Man Roster may not be placed on option."
AND user will be able to 'Override and Continue' or click 'Back'

title: System should determine player's current MLS on an EFA tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an Elect Free Agency tx for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN they select the Free Agent tx
AND create new
custom_expected:
THEN they will see MLS field on tx
AND it will reflect what is in the player's profile

title: Approving a Declare MN League Free Agent tx should update player's Waivers info.
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has submitted a MN league Declare Free Agent tx
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user Approves MN league Free Agent tx
custom_expected:
THEN set all flags to Null-
*On Approve:*
 - Set the player’s optional waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s optional waivers in effect date to null
- Set the player’s outright waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s outright waivers in effect date to null
- Set the player’s trade waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s trade waivers in effect date to null

- Set the player's optional waiver start date to null
- Set the player's optional waiver request id to null
- Set the player's outright waiver start date to null
- Set the player's outright waiver request id to null
- Set the player's trade waiver start date to null
- Set the player's trade waiver request id to null

*On Reverse:*
- Set the player’s Optional waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Option waivers effective date back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Outright waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Outright waivers effective date back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Trade waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Trade waivers effective date back to its previous value.

- Set the player's optional waiver start date back to its previous value.
- Set the player's optional waiver request id back to its previous value.
- Set the player's outright waiver start date back to its previous value.
- Set the player's outright waiver request id back to its previous value.
- Set the player's trade waiver start date back to its previous value.
- Set the player's trade waiver request id back to its previous value.

title: Approving an Optional Assignment should update player's Waivers info.
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has submitted an Optional Assignment
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user Approves Optional Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN set all flags to Null-
* Once the option is approved, update the following information for the player:
* Set Option waiver effective flag to 0
* Set Option waiver effective date to null

* Set the player's optional waiver start date to null
* Set the player's optional waiver request id to null

* If the option is reversed, update the following information for the player: 
* Set Option waiver effective flag to value from prior to transaction being approved
* Set Option waiver effective date to to value from prior to transaction being approved

* Set the player’s Optional waivers flag back to its previous value.
* Set the player’s Option waivers effective date back to its previous value.

title: Approving a MJ/MN Outright tx should update player's Waivers info.
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has submitted a MJ/MN Outright tx
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user Approves MJ/MN Outright tx
custom_expected:
THEN set all flags to Null-
On Approve:
- Set the player’s optional waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s optional waivers in effect date to null
- Set the player’s outright waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s outright waivers in effect date to null
- Set the player’s trade waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s trade waivers in effect date to null

Set the player's optional waiver start date to null
Set the player's optional waiver request id to null
Set the player's outright waiver start date to null
Set the player's outright waiver request id to null
Set the player's trade waiver start date to null
Set the player's trade waiver request id to null

On Reverse:
- Set the player’s Optional waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Option waivers effective date back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Outright waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Outright waivers effective date back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Trade waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Trade waivers effective date back to its previous value.

Set the player's optional waiver start date back to its previous value.
Set the player's optional waiver request id back to its previous value.
Set the player's outright waiver start date back to its previous value.
Set the player's outright waiver request id back to its previous value.
Set the player's trade waiver start date back to its previous value.
Set the player's trade waiver request id back to its previous value

title: Approving a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A) should update player's Waivers info.
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has submitted a Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user Approves Player Terminates Contract Under Paragraph 7(A)
custom_expected:
THEN set all flags to Null-
On Approve:
- Set the player’s optional waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s optional waivers in effect date to null
- Set the player’s outright waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s outright waivers in effect date to null
- Set the player’s trade waivers in effect flag to 0 (false)
- Set the player’s trade waivers in effect date to null

Set the player's optional waiver start date to null
Set the player's optional waiver request id to null
Set the player's outright waiver start date to null
Set the player's outright waiver request id to null
Set the player's trade waiver start date to null
Set the player's trade waiver request id to null

On Reverse:
- Set the player’s Optional waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Option waivers effective date back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Outright waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Outright waivers effective date back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Trade waivers flag back to its previous value.
- Set the player’s Trade waivers effective date back to its previous value.

Set the player's optional waiver start date back to its previous value.
Set the player's optional waiver request id back to its previous value.
Set the player's outright waiver start date back to its previous value.
Set the player's outright waiver request id back to its previous value.
Set the player's trade waiver start date back to its previous value.
Set the player's trade waiver request id back to its previous value
